h1.content: font-weight: bold; color: #0c4a6e; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #0c4a6e 0%, #0369a1 100%); -webkit-background-clip: text; -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent; background-clip: text;

h2.base: margin: 28px 0 0; font-size: 1.5em; letter-spacing: -0.02em; line-height: 1.5; border-left: 5px solid #0284c7; padding-left: 15px;

h3.content: font-weight: bold; color: #0284c7; display: inline-block; border-bottom: 2px solid #7dd3fc;

code.block: color: #333; background: #f0f9ff; border-radius: 8px; border: 1px solid #bae6fd; box-shadow: 0 2px 4px rgba(14,165,233,0.1); margin: 1.2em 0; padding: 1em 1em 1em;  font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6; white-space: pre-wrap;
code.inline: background: #e0f2fe; padding: 2px 6px; border-radius: 4px; color: #0369a1; font-size: 14px; border: 1px solid #bae6fd;

styles.quote: border-left: 4px solid #0ea5e9; border-radius: 6px; padding: 12px 16px; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #f0f9ff 0%, #e0f2fe 100%); margin: 0.8em 0; color: #0c4a6e; font-style: italic; word-wrap: break-word;
styles.image: max-width: 100%; height: auto; margin: 1em auto; display: block; border-radius: 8px;
styles.link: color: #0284c7; text-decoration: none; border-bottom: 1px solid #7dd3fc; transition: all 0.2s ease;

table.container: width: 100%; margin: 1em 0; border-collapse: collapse; border: 1px solid #bae6fd;
table.header: background: linear-gradient(135deg, #0c4a6e 0%, #0369a1 100%); font-weight: bold; color: #ffffff; border-bottom: 2px solid #0ea5e9; font-size: 1em;
